articles.title: Japan Urged to Settle Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Settle Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The North Side Committee, the South Side Committee and the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration released a resolution Saturday, 99 years since the Japanese imperialists fabricated the aggressive and brigandish "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty".
					 The resolution branded the treaty as an illegal and invalid "treaty" as it was faked up by the Japanese imperialists in a coercive manner after encircling the Royal Palace of the Ri Dynasty by force of arms and instigating traitors.
					
					 It accused Japan of shamelessly distorting its history and making "a claim to Tok Islet" instead of repenting of and apologizing for its criminal acts and history of aggression and, at the same time, putting spurs to the overseas dispatch of the "Self-Defense Forces", arms race and nuclear weaponization in disregard of the "Pacifist Constitution" which has existed for the sake of its form.
					
					 We will certainly settle accounts with Japan for its aggression, plunder and the state-sponsored crimes committed against the Korean nation in the past century and force it to make apology and reparation for all those crimes, it stressed.
					
					 It went on: We will launch a nationwide movement against Japan's design to seize Tok Islet and distortion of history and resolutely reject and condemn its moves for reinvasion and hostile acts against the Korean nation.
					
					 It called upon all the fellow countrymen at home and abroad to unite close as one under the banner of patriotism and turn out in the patriotic movement to defend the sovereignty of the nation and reject Japan's distortion of history and moves to grab Tok Islet and stage a comeback to Korea.

articles.title: Secretary General of IIJI Arrives
articles.content:
Secretary General of IIJI Arrives
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party arrived here today.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned on Saturday by Kenichi Ogami on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 A gift to Kim Jong Il from the secretary general of the IIJI was also conveyed.

articles.title: Documentary Film Shown
articles.content:
Documentary Film Shown 
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- A Korean documentary film "They Are Together on the Way of the Great Songun Leadership" was shown at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday.
					The film makes a historic depiction of the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed by developing the People's Army into an invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and boosting the defence capability of the country in every way, being together on the way of Songun leadership for several decades.
					
					It has scenes showing the President making sure that a revolutionary commanding system of
						Kim Jong Il was established throughout the army and providing an eternal foundation for carrying forward the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					It also shows Kim Jong Il bringing about a great turn in the building of armed forces and national defence, faithfully carrying forward the President's idea and line of attaching importance to the army and military affairs since he started his Songun revolutionary leadership by visiting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, Juche 49 (1960).
					
					 Among the audience were senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and working people in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Immortal Work for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Immortal Work for Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il made public a famous work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" in August Juche 86 (1997).
					 The work embraces in a comprehensive way the immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung who put forth the national reunification as the supreme task of the nation from the first days of the country's division and strengthened and developed the reunification movement into a nation-wide movement.
					
					 It indicates in an all-round way the tasks and ways for achieving national reunification such as the question of attaining the country's reunification on the principle of national independence, the question of realizing the great unity with priority to the interests common to the nation, the question of accomplishing the reunification in a peaceful way and the question of establishing a unified state of the nation on the basis of federation formula.
					
					 The work gives clear-cut answers to all the issues for solving the country's reunification question by the Korean nation itself in accordance with the President's line of national reunification.
					
					 Thanks to the noble moral obligation and firm will of leader Kim Jong Il to inherit and carry out with credit the President's cause of national reunification, the Korean nation could turn out in the nationwide campaign for accomplishing the cause of independent reunification without wavering in the anti-reunification whirlwind and usher in the June 15 reunification era.
					
					 But the reunification of the Korean nation is faced with grave difficulties by the vicious moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group, which is taking no account of the reunification of the country and the interests of the nation, is raising frenzied anti-DPRK confrontation clamor in league with foreign forces, refusing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The negation of the declarations is no other than the negation of the national reconciliation and unity and is an intolerable treachery to the nation.
					
					 No matter how desperately the anti-reunification forces may run, they cannot break the aspiration and will of the Korean people to achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity with the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.

articles.title: KCNA Urges U.S. to Drop Its Nuclear Blackmail Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Urges U.S. to Drop Its Nuclear Blackmail Policy toward DPRK
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has frantically staged Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises together with the south Korean puppet warmongers since August 17 defying protest and denunciation of the DPRK and the international community.
					They are describing the exercises as "defensive" and "annual ones" in a bid to cover up their aggressive and offensive nature but no one will be taken in by such foolish rhetoric.
					
					UFG is a nuclear test war and a preliminary war to bring down the ideology and system in the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. openly codenamed the military exercises "freedom" just as it called the Afghan and Iraqi wars "enduring freedom" and "free Iraq". This is an intolerable challenge to the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK. And this is a clear indication that the U.S. is making preparations for a war of aggression behind the scene of dialogue with an aim to bring to naught all the precious gains in the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. has already specified the provision of "extended deterrence" to south Korea in an official document, thus making it a fait accompli that the second Korean war will be a nuclear war.
					
					It goes without saying that the on-going exercises are vicious nuclear war exercises pursuant to the above-said scenario.
					
					The U.S. provision of "extended deterrence" to south Korea, the updating of the scenario for anti-DPRK operations based on it and its application to the exercises prove that the reckless design of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers to mount a surprise preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK is becoming a reality.
					
					The U.S. is bringing dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang heavily over the Korean Peninsula, while escalating military pressure upon the DPRK, pursuant to its policy of "dialogue and pressure" towards the DPRK.  Under this situation the army and people of the DPRK keenly realize once again how just it was when it chose to have access to nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					It is the invariable attitude and stand of the DPRK to react to the U.S. nuclear threat with nukes, its missile threat with missiles and its moves to drive "confrontation" to an extreme phase with just all-out confrontation of Korean style.
					
					The U.S. had better roll back its anachronistic and hostile nuclear blackmail policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA on More Facts about Korean Victims of Forced Labor
articles.content:
KCNA on More Facts about Korean Victims of Forced Labor
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- More facts about the Japanese imperialists' posthumous disposal of Korean victims of forced labor were disclosed, lashing people into fury.
					According to information available, dead bodies of more than 70 Koreans who were forced to do hard labor in a mine on Hokkaido of Japan in the 1930s-1940s were cremated after their death. It is presumed that Japan burned the dead bodies in order to cover up the causes of their death such as pneumonia, pulmonary tuberculosis, contusion and asphyxiation as they might bring to light the cruel working conditions at that time.
					
					The Korean victims underwent such bitter sufferings that no other nation of the world has ever experienced. The Japanese imperialists perpetrated such hideous crime against humanity to prevent the world people from knowing the truth about the death of Korean draftees.
					
					It was only a few days ago when it was disclosed that Japan left the remains of Koreans, who met grievous deaths at the hands of the Japanese imperialists, inside the pit faces as they were and in other places uncared for, refusing to hand them over to their relatives and bereaved families in their hometowns. The recent disclosure of the truth about the cremation of Koreans has again lashed people into greater fury.
					
					Most of those persons fell miserable victim to the Japanese imperialists that planned the war of aggression against the Asian continent and set up a fascist war mobilization system.
					
					The Japanese imperialists conducted a wholesale operation to exploit and fleece manpower in Korea, considering all of Koreans as targets of the "Law on Compulsory Labor." They forcibly took Koreans to sites of drudgery or hurled them to war shambles, driving them to death.
					
					More than 8.4 million young and middle-aged Koreans were taken to the above-said sites and war shambles after being forcibly drafted by the Japanese imperialists in Korea. Even women, boys aged 8 and 60 years old men were forced to do slave labor under the name of "Volunteers Corps" and "Patriotic Laborers' Corps".
					
					The Japanese imperialists did not take even elementary labor protection measures for Korean laborers engaged in the most dangerous work, thus forcing many of them to meet tragic deaths in group. Those Koreans starved to death or were buried to death in the collapsed pits or beaten to death. No one knows how many Koreans met such grievous death.
					
					They were even disgraced after their death.
					
					Japan, however, has so far persistently evaded the responsibility to redeem its past crimes, far from making apology and reparation for those hideous crimes against humanity. What is more intolerable is that it has craftily worked to keep those crimes buried into oblivion.
					
					The Japanese authorities have worked hard to evade the responsibility to make apology and reparation to Korea, the biggest victim of the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists, even though more than six decades have passed since their defeat. They are painting Japan as "a victim" and kicking up an anti-DPRK racket, stoking bitterness toward it. 
					
					The political chicanery such as distortion of history to which the Japanese reactionaries are persistently resorting at present, while shunning the settlement of Japan's past is little different from what Imperial Japan did to cover up its crimes at any cost.
					
					Japan is a brazen-faced country as it has refused to make reparation though so many years have elapsed since it inflicted indescribably huge human, material and mental damage to Korea and its people throughout its history.
					
					It is challenging the Korean people shaking with bitter grudge and resentment at it, persistently refusing to admit its past crimes. They will certainly force the Japanese reactionaries to pay a high price for the blood shed by their brothers and sisters.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Japanese Imperialists' Fabrication of Document for Korean Aggression
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Japanese Imperialists' Fabrication of Document for Korean Aggression
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists turned the whole of Korea into a colony through fraud, threat and blackmail. This crime deserves punishment by justice and human conscience as it was a brigandish act unprecedented in the world history of conquering other countries. 
					 Minju Joson Saturday says this in a signed commentary carried 99 years since the Japanese imperialists cooked up the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" at the point of bayonet to pave the way for Korean aggression.
					
					 Citing detailed facts to explain how this document was fabricated, the commentary goes on:
					
					 Since the defeat of Japan, its government has justified its past crimes, falsifying the above-said stark historical reality.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists invaded Korea on the basis of the above-said "document" which was no more than a waste paper having no legal validity, imposing colonial slavery upon the Koreans. They will never tolerate this monstrous crime but certainly force Japan to pay for it.
					
					 They will always remember the truth of history that a country may go to ruin in a moment but its rehabilitation will last for a millennium.
					
					 The Korean people will bolster up their capability for self-defense in every way in order not to see the repetition of the national tragedy in which they were subject to slavery in bitter tears as they were too weak to react to the strong-arm policy of outsiders to infringe upon the sovereignty of their country.

articles.title: Retraction of Confrontation Policy Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Retraction of Confrontation Policy Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Anti-dictatorship Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea released a statement on Aug. 19, urging the Lee Myung Bak group to settle the problem of the inter-Korean relations.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the joint press release between the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee and the Hyundai Group of south Korea was made public on Aug. 17, giving all the Koreans the expectation and hope for improvement of the inter-Korean relations and positive development of the cooperation for the co-prosperity of the nation under the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
					
					 The future developments depend on the attitude of the Lee Myung Bak "government," the statement said, urging the authorities to squarely look into the reality, though belatedly, and retract the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 It held that the Lee group should respect and implement the inter-Korean declarations, far from getting hell-bent on the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises with the United States.
					
					 The youth and students will never allow Lee Myung Bak's anti-reunification reckless action obstructive to the implementation of the said declarations, the desire and steadfast will of the whole nation, it declared.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea War Exercises Blasted
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea War Exercises Blasted
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea in Jordan issued a statement on August 11 to accuse the United States and the south Korean puppets of their Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 The statement branded the exercises as a grave provocation further aggravating the tense situation of the Korean Peninsula and bringing it to the brink of war and destroying the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					
					It has become clear that the U.S., which works in cahoots with the Lee Myung Bak clique branded as a traitor to the Korean nation, can not play any role for peace and stability of the world, to say nothing of the Korean Peninsula, it said, strongly demanding a halt to the joint military exercises posing threat to the DPRK and the rest of the world.
					
					 The U.S. should be aware that peace is realized through dialogue, not by bloody aggression, it held.
					
					 The statement expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people in the struggle to drive the foreign forces out of the Korean Peninsula and achieve national reunification.

articles.title: U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises Rebuked
articles.content:
U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises Rebuked
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on August 19 demanding a stop to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean bellicose forces.
					 The statement noted that the nuclear war exercises kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets despite the unanimous public rebuff and denunciation at home and abroad are exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK to all intents and purposes and an intolerable challenge to all the fellow countrymen desirous of the peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 The statement held that the joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK and the arms build-up should be halted unconditionally as they vitiate the atmosphere of dialogue and peace and increase the danger of a war.
					
					 The association and all Koreans in China are strongly opposed to the racket of military confrontation kicked up by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers to block the development of the north-south relations and disturb peace on the Korean Peninsula and hamstring the efforts to achieve the prosperity of the nation while threatening the existence of the nation, the statement noted, adding they would fight to the last to eliminate from the arena of history those keen to do harm to fellow countrymen by force of arms in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 Meanwhile, the chairperson of the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine also issued a statement on August 18 in denunciation of the on-going UFG.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner for Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which inherited and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode which most correctly reflected the requirements of the times and the revolution. Also expounded in it are the validity and advantages of the Songun politics and its great vitality.

articles.title: Liberation Day of Korea Celebrated
articles.content:
Liberation Day of Korea Celebrated
 Pyongyang August 22 (KCNA) -- Meetings and a lecture were held in Democratic Congo, Poland and Ukraine on August 13 and 14 to mark the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos on his Songun leadership exploits and books and photos on the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, at a meeting mentioned the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung who liberated Korea, the worldwide significance of Korea's liberation and the validity of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					60-odd years have passed since Korea was liberated, but there still goes on the colonial rule of the U.S. in the southern part of the Korean Peninsula, he pointed out, saying: The only way for achieving the reunification of Korea is to drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea and found the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					
					 The chairman of the Poland-Korea Association said at a meeting that it is the brilliant fruition of the original Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il that the Korean people have smashed every move of the hostile forces against the DPRK and socialism and dynamically advanced toward the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation and the reunification of the country with unshakable confidence in victory, invariably upholding the banner of socialism.
					
					 Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, said in the lecture that the brilliant revolutionary traditions created in the anti-Japanese struggle are now being inherited reliably by the Songun politics.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event in Ukraine.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Celebrated by Koreans in Ukraine
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Celebrated by Koreans in Ukraine
Pyongyang August 22 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine on August 15 held an event to commemorate the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership and the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					Kim Yong Sul, chairman of the confederation, said at the event that President Kim Il Sung defeated the Japanese imperialists with arms of Songun to liberate the country and ushered in a new era of independence, dignity and prosperity of the nation in Korea.
					
					The patriotic cause of the President is being successfully carried forward under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, the speaker said, lauding Kim Jong Il for having smashed the imperialist allied forces' political pressure, military threat and economic blockade by dint of Songun to reliably defend the national dignity and sovereignty and opened an epochal phase for national reunification.
					
					 He stressed that the day of independent reunification would surely come as it is led by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated in Japan
articles.content:
Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated in Japan
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Ehime Prefectural Preparatory Committee of Japan was inaugurated on August 5 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Nada Takashi, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize such colorful political and cultural events as lecture and photo exhibition praising the President's immortal exploits for the human cause of independence and publish books on the Songun leadership exploits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il until April of 2012.

articles.title: Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio publica resolucion
articles.content:
Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio publica resolucion 
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ATCC) -- Los comites norteno, sureno y ultramarino para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio (Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio) hicieron publica el dia 22 una resolucion con motivo del 99o aniversario de la fabricacion del agresivo y leonino "Tratado de anexion de Corea a Japon" por parte de los imperialistas japoneses.
					Ese "tratado" ilegal lo inventaron de manera coercitiva los imperialistas japoneses asediando con las fuerzas armadas el palacio real de la dinastia de los Ri e instigando a los traidores a la patria, senala la nota y continua:
					
					En lugar de sentir remordimiento y pedir disculpas por esos crimenes y su historia de agresion, Japon tergiversa descaradamente su historia del pasado e insiste en su "jurisdiccion sobre la isla Tok". Al mismo tiempo, da acicate al envio a ultramar de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa", al aumento de gastos militares y al armamentismo nuclear sin comprometerse a la "constitucion pacifista" que vino existiendo nominalmente. 
					
					Nosotros ajustaremos la cuenta, cueste lo que cueste, de la agresion, el saqueo y otros crimenes antieticos de Estado cometidos por Japon en el siglo pasado contra la nacion coreana y no dejaremos de luchar hasta que ese pais isleno pida disculpas e indemnice. 
					
					Desplegaremos el movimiento pannacional contra la intencion de Japon de usurpar la isla Tok y sus maniobras de tergiversacion de la historia y rechazaremos tajantemente sus acciones dirigidas a retomar el camino de agresion y hostilizar a la nacion coreana.
					
					Exhortamos a toda la nacion en el interior y el exterior del pais a levantarse, unida como un solo hombre bajo la bandera del patriotismo, en el movimiento patriotico por defender la soberania nacional y frustrar las maniobras de Japon tendentes a tergiversar la historia, usurpar la isla Tok y agredir de nuevo a la nacion coreana.

articles.title: ATCC denuncia chantaje de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ATCC denuncia chantaje de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ATCC) -- A pesar de la protesta y la denuncia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la sociedad internacional, Estados Unidos y los titeres belicistas surcoreanos libran a partir del dia 17 el ejercicio militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian".
					En el intento de disimular el caracter agresivo y ofensivo de esa maniobra, ellos recurren a la inaceptable hablilla de que ella es "defensiva" y "anual".
					
					"Ulji Freedom Guardian" es la guerra nuclear de prueba y preliminar para acabar con la idea y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. incluyo en el nombre de este ejercicio la palabra "libertad" (freedom) como habia nombrado las operaciones de guerra contra Afganistan e Irak: "la libertad indoblegable" y "la libertad de Irak". 
					
					Esto deviene la prueba contundente de que EE.UU. esta preparando detras de la cortina del dialogo la guerra de agresion para acabar con todo lo valioso de la RPDC, siendo imperdonable desafio a la soberania y la dignidad de esta.
					
					Al documentar ya el ofrecimiento del "disuasivo ampliado" al Sur de Corea, EE.UU. confirmo que seria nuclear la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					Claro esta que "Ulji Freedom Guardian" es el mas siniestro ejercicio de guerra nuclear que parte de ese designio. La enmienda del plan operacional de agresion al Norte de Corea suponiendo el suministro del "disuasivo ampliado" y su aplicacion en el presente ejercicio muestran que se consuma en hechos el imprudente intento de los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos de atacar sorpresiva y preventivamente a la RPDC con armas nucleares.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos vuelven a reconocer una vez mas cuan justa opcion fue haber adquirido el disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa bajo la situacion actual en que EE.UU. intenta estallar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana recrudeciendo la presion militar a la RPDC segun su politica sobre esta del "dialogo y la presion".
					
					Responder al arma nuclear de EE.UU. con el arma nuclear, al misil con el misil y al climax de la "confrontacion" con la justa guerra total a nuestro estilo, esto es la invariable posicion de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. debe poner fin a su anacronica politica hostil y de chantaje nuclear a la RPDC.

articles.title: ATCC revela los crimenes de Japon manchados de sangre
articles.content:
ATCC revela los crimenes de Japon manchados de sangre
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ATCC) -- Hacen vibrar de colera a la gente los recien descubiertos datos sobre la muerte de los coreanos que habian sido sometidos al trabajo forzado por los imperialistas japoneses.
					Segun ellos, en la decada de los 30 y 40 del siglo pasado, fueron incinerados mas de 70 coreanos muertos como consecuencia del trabajo forzado en la mina de Hokkaido de Japon.
					
					Las causas de esas muertes como la pulmonia, la tuberculosis pulmonar, la contusion y la asfixia muestran las duras condiciones de trabajo de aquel entonces.
					
					Se infiere que los imperialistas japoneses quemaron esos cadaveres para no dejar rastros de esas causas.
					
					Este peor crimen de lesa humanidad partio del intento de impedir que se sepa la verdad por la muerte de esas victimas que sufrieron las desgracias que nunca ha probado ninguna otra nacion del mundo.
					
					Hace poco, se ha revelado el otro crimen de los imperialistas japoneses que habian echado al fondo de las galerias o abandonado en los lugares apartados los restos de los coreanos muertos injustamente por aquellos, lejos de devolverlos a los familiares y parientes en las tierras natales de ellos.
					
					La mayoria de ellos son los que murieron tragicamente en aras del cumplimiento de la guerra de agresion de los imperialistas japoneses que se precipitaban para establecer el sistema de movilizacion para su planeada guerra fascista en el continente asiatico.
					
					Los imperialistas japoneses perpetraron la explotacion y el saqueo de la mano de obra aplicando la "ley del reclutamiento para el trabajo forzoso" a toda la nacion coreana.
					
					Sobrepasan mas de 8 millones 400 mil los coreanos que habian sido reclutados forzadamente y ubicados en los campos de duros trabajos y de batallas donde la muerte los amenazaba constantemente.
					
					Tambien, habian sido maltratados de la peor manera que a los animales hasta las mujeres, los ninos de 8 anos de edad y los ancianos sesentones reclutados por conceptos de "Cuerpo de voluntarias" y el "Cuerpo del trabajo patriotico".
					
					Los imperialistas japoneses obligaban a los coreanos las faenas mas peligrosas sin tomar ni la mas elemental medida de seguridad laboral. De esta manera, murieron en masas incontables coreanos por el hambre, el derrumbe de galerias y a golpes, etc.
					
					Ellos siguen sufriendo afrentas aun despues de su muerte.
					
					Hasta la fecha, Japon no pide disculpas ni indemniza todavia sus infames crimenes antieticos contra el pueblo coreano.
					
					Al contrario, elude obstinadamente su responsabilidad de liquidar sus crimenes del pasado y maniobra vilmente para dejarlos a toda costa en el olvido de la historia.
					
					Aunque transcurrieron mas de 60 anos desde su derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial, las autoridades japonesas se resisten a pedir disculpas y recompensar a la RPDC, victima mas grande de dichos crimenes, y dan el clima extremadamente hostil a esta mediante la feroz campana anticoreana haciendose descaradamente las "victimas".
					
					Son las mismas las conductas del viejo Japon, que maniobro para encubrir a toda costa sus crimenes del pasado, y de los reaccionarios japoneses de hoy que recurren con teson a los actos fraudulentos politicos como eludir la liquidacion del pasado y tergiversar la historia.
					
					Asi son tan grandes las perdidas humanas, materiales y espirituales que causa historicamente a la nacion coreana ese pais tan cinico.
					
					El pueblo coreano, que guarda el gran rencor y odio a Japon, cobrara sin falta el precio de su sangre derramada por culpa de los reaccionarios japoneses que actuan de manera desafiante haciendo vista gorda de sus crimenes del pasado.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica "documento de anexion de Corea a Japon"
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica "documento de anexion de Corea a Japon"
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ATCC) -- El imperialismo japones convirtio en el siglo pasado a Corea en su colonia haciendo uso de fraudes, estafas, amenaza y chantaje. Este acto bandidesco sin precedente en la historia mundial de guerras de conquista debe ser enjuiciado por la justicia y la conciencia de la humanidad.
					Asi insiste el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este sabado con motivo del 99o aniversario de la invencion a fuerza de bayonetas del "documento de anexion de Corea a Japon" para la agresion a la primera.
					
					Tras revelar con datos todo el curso de fabricacion de ese documento, el comentarista senalo que el gobierno japones vino tergiversando este irrefutable hecho historico y justificando sus crimenes del pasado desde su derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					El pueblo coreano no perdonara jamas los crimenes del imperialismo japones, que en virtud de tal "documento" muerto sin ninguna vigencia legal, invadio a Corea e impuso a la nacion coreana la vida de esclava colonial, y cobrara sin falta el precio de ello, afirmo.
					
					Y no olvidara ni por un momento la verdad de la historia de que el pais se arruina en un momento, pero se necesitan mil anos para restaurarlo, subrayo.
					
					Para no repetir la tragedia nacional de haber corrido el destino de esclavo impotente de hacer frente al despotismo de las fuerzas extranjeras deseosas de violar la soberania del pais, el pueblo coreano consolidara mil veces las fuerzas armadas para la autodefensa, ratifica el rotativo.
